name: Tank Infinite Runner
description:
A simple tank based procedurally generated infinite scroller.

You must do three things:

  1. Don't get killed
  2. Don't scroll off the bottom of the screen
  3. Don't let an enemy scroll off the bottom of the screen

Keyboard controls: Arrow keys move, a w s d fires

Touchscreen controls: Left side of screen fires. Right side of  screen moves.


Difficulty increases as you progress.

Just getting started. Please leave feedback!
